website_summaries.verdict: A pool alarm system that is designed to go off if anything larger than 18 lbs. drops into the pool.
pros: Mounts to the side of the pool
Can work in either an aboveground pool or in-ground pool
Performs as expected with weights above 18 lbs
cons: The alarm does not come with a remote and must be turned off manually

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time, they dont work right at all.
customer_reviews.text: went through 2 of these, neither worked correctly. It either goes off in mild wind or doesnt work even if im splashing the unit directly. no good. And my state requires such a device, serously, if i cant get it to activate when I enter the pool (280 lbs) how can i expect it to go off when a child enters?
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Works great sometimes would not trust kids life to it.
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy then tested per instructions and it worked. A little delayed on trigger but worked. Inside alarm trigger and all was good Tried it again two days later and nothing. Wife don't trust it so I am returning but if this is just a backup to other safety measures it maybe decent as if it triggers everybody in the neighborhood knows someone is in your pool. One thing to note is i only tested like 2' away. Once it failed the close test I never bother with testing at the further part of pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ouma Moss

customer_reviews.title: Works as required - hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box, read the easy to follow instructions, installed with ease, and then went thru about a hour of adjustments to get it set just right. It’s a ‘secondary’ device that my city requires now, based upon a new, absolutely stupid CA law.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The alarm works well. There are some pros and cons. I wish the unit had a better way to turn it off and on and go into the different modes. Having to bend over and practically lay on the concrete pad to read it can be hot. Besides that the unit is sensitive and the neighborhood can hear the alarm outside and the remote alarm is loud enough to hear it through the ~2400 sq ft house. The best thing is how easy the unit is to install. It took all of drilling two holes and putting in sinkers and screws.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy and basically it works
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and basically it works. We had some gusty winds and that set it off, so I just don't leave it on anymore. I just can't trust it won't be set off at odd times and I don't want to wake the neighbors with a false alarm. If I could send it back, I would because it's $130 just sitting the the edge of my pool doing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: ONLY LASTED 6 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: Got this last year with our new in ground pool and was very happy with it. Stored it away for the winter and when I put out for use this year it was shot. First I couldn't get the alarm to work at all, then the indoor alarm started going off for no reason at all. For what this cost it should last more than one season.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S. Locatelli

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This pool alarm works very well so far. I was afraid of false alarms but we have not had any. It was installed in May on an above-ground 18 ft round pool and it has worked flawlessly for the last three months. It is on all day (except during swimming) and all night and we have had no problems at all with false alarms, regardless of the weather (storms, high winds, etc.). We test it regularly and it sets off appropriately when we drop an eighteen pound weight in the pool. Anything weighing less than 18 lbs that we tried did not set the alarm off. Overall, this product has been hassle-free so far and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CSZ

110V AC powered receiver (with 9v battery backup; battery not included)
Six (6) D size batteries (not included) for sensor

Electronic sensor detects entry into pool by children, pets, or intruders
Remote receiver sounds when the pool alarm is activated—100 ft wireless range
Alarm is designed to detect objects weighing 18 pounds or more 110V A/C or 9 volt battery powered receiver
